Note: The user / PT mentioned that they would have loved to be able to edit / pause a message being sent.

The user / PT mentioned that it was a lot easier watching the video this time - having the video pause when a message came through and being able to pick up where they left off. They also said not having a display didn’t bother them.
The user / PT mentioned that it was much easier to concentrate than having to see  a display all the time . Especially during the meta scavenger hunt, they found it less straining.

The user / PT asked if either of the glasses could work both ways. They mentioned they would love the option to activate / deactivate the display when asking questions using the “hey meta “ command for eg. in essence they didn’t want a visual in response to every question while that might be sometimes desired.
